titleStmt.title: A declaration of the bloudie and unchristian acting of William Star and John Taylor of Walton, vvith divers men in womens apparell, in opposition to those that dig upon George-hill in Surrey.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert at the black Spread-Eagle in the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the black Spread-Eagle in the West end of Pauls
